question: Which drugs target both HDAC8 and HDAC9?
gold_cypher:
MATCH (t:Therapy)-[r1:TARGETS]->(g1:Gene)
WHERE toLower(g1.symbol) = toLower('HDAC8')
   OR any(s IN coalesce(g1.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('HDAC8'))
MATCH (t)-[r2:TARGETS]->(g2:Gene)
WHERE toLower(g2.symbol) = toLower('HDAC9')
   OR any(s IN coalesce(g2.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('HDAC9'))
RETURN
  g1.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  r1.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r1.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r1.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r1.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100
generated_cypher:
MATCH (t:Therapy)-[r1:TARGETS]->(g1:Gene)
WHERE toLower(g1.symbol) = toLower('HDAC8') OR any(s IN coalesce(g1.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('HDAC8'))
MATCH (t)-[r2:TARGETS]->(g2:Gene)
WHERE toLower(g2.symbol) = toLower('HDAC9') OR any(s IN coalesce(g2.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('HDAC9'))
RETURN
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  g1.symbol AS gene1_symbol,
  g2.symbol AS gene2_symbol,
  r1.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r1.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r1.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r1.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100

question: Which drugs target biomarkers of resistance to Platinum Compound in Ovarian Serous Carcinoma?
gold_cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t1:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t1.name) = toLower('Platinum Compound')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t1.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Platinum Compound'))
  OR toLower(t1.name) CONTAINS toLower('Platinum Compound')
)
  AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'ovarian' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'serous' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
MATCH (t2:Therapy)-[r:TARGETS]->(tg:Gene)
WHERE (
  toLower(tg.symbol) = toLower(gene_symbol)
  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))
)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Platinum Compound')
RETURN
  gene_symbol,
  t2.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100
generated_cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('carboplatin') OR
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('cisplatin') OR
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('oxaliplatin') OR
  any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('carboplatin')) OR
  any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('cisplatin')) OR
  any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('oxaliplatin')) OR
  toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('carboplatin') OR
  toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('cisplatin') OR
  toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('oxaliplatin') OR
  any(tag IN coalesce(t.tags, []) WHERE toLower(tag) CONTAINS toLower('platinum'))
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS toLower('ovarian')
AND toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS toLower('serous')
AND toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS toLower('carcinoma')
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
RETURN
  CASE WHEN b:Variant THEN coalesce(b.name, b.hgvs_p) ELSE NULL END AS variant_name,
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

question: Find therapies that target resistance genes for Imatinib in Melanoma.
gold_cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t1:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t1.name) = toLower('Imatinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t1.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Imatinib'))
  OR toLower(t1.name) CONTAINS toLower('Imatinib')
)
  AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'melanoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
MATCH (t2:Therapy)-[r:TARGETS]->(tg:Gene)
WHERE (
  toLower(tg.symbol) = toLower(gene_symbol)
  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))
)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Imatinib')
RETURN
  gene_symbol,
  t2.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100
generated_cypher:
MATCH (t:Therapy)
WHERE toLower(t.name) = toLower('Imatinib') OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Imatinib'))
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t)
WHERE toLower(rel.effect) = toLower('resistance')
  AND toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS toLower('melanoma')
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Variant THEN b.name ELSE NULL END AS variant_name,
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL OR variant_name IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH
  variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  effect,
  disease_name,
  collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

question: Which drugs target biomarkers of resistance to Dasatinib in Naevocarcinoma?
gold_cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t1:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t1.name) = toLower('Dasatinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t1.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Dasatinib'))
  OR toLower(t1.name) CONTAINS toLower('Dasatinib')
)
  AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'melanoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
MATCH (t2:Therapy)-[r:TARGETS]->(tg:Gene)
WHERE (
  toLower(tg.symbol) = toLower(gene_symbol)
  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))
)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Dasatinib')
RETURN
  gene_symbol,
  t2.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100

question: Find therapies that target resistance genes for Gemcitabine in Pancreatic Adenocarcinoma.
gold_cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t1:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t1.name) = toLower('Gemcitabine')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t1.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Gemcitabine'))
  OR toLower(t1.name) CONTAINS toLower('Gemcitabine')
)
  AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'pancreatic' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'adenocarcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
MATCH (t2:Therapy)-[r:TARGETS]->(tg:Gene)
WHERE (
  toLower(tg.symbol) = toLower(gene_symbol)
  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))
)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Gemcitabine')
RETURN
  gene_symbol,
  t2.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100

WHERE (toLower(t.name) = toLower('Gemcitabine') OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Gemcitabine')))
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS toLower('pancreatic')
AND toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS toLower('adenocarcinoma')
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)

question: Show treatments hitting ALK that have biomarker evidence in Non-small Cell Lung Carcinoma.
gold_cypher:
MATCH (t:Therapy)-[:TARGETS]->(g:Gene)
WHERE toLower(g.symbol) = toLower('ALK')
   OR any(s IN coalesce(g.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('ALK'))
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t)
WHERE (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'lung' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'non-small' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cell' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(bg:Gene)
RETURN
  CASE WHEN b:Variant THEN b.name ELSE NULL END AS variant_name,
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE bg.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100
generated_cypher:
MATCH (t:Therapy)-[r:TARGETS]->(g:Gene)
WHERE toLower(g.symbol) = toLower('ALK') OR any(s IN coalesce(g.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('ALK'))
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t)
WHERE toLower(rel.effect) = 'sensitivity' OR toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS toLower('lung')
AND toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS toLower('non-small')
AND toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS toLower('cell')
AND toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS toLower('carcinoma')
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(gene:Gene)
RETURN
  CASE WHEN b:Variant THEN coalesce(b.name, b.hgvs_p) ELSE NULL END AS variant_name,
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE gene.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100
